synopsis.text:
Amergan, a wisecracking spectral companion, joins the immortal Scottish Highlander, Colin MacLeod, on a relentless pursuit of vengeance against Marcus Octavius, the immortal tyrant who brutally murdered Colin's beloved, Moya, on the Celtic plains centuries ago. In a dystopian present, where the once-magnificent city of New York lies submerged beneath the waves, the imposing fortress of Marcus Octavius reigns supreme.

Torn between his desire to avenge Moya and his responsibility to save the remaining inhabitants of New York, Colin faces a moral dilemma. As he navigates a desolate landscape teeming with monstrous creatures, Colin's unwavering determination to confront Marcus is bolstered by an unlikely alliance with a resilient prostitute and a mysterious freedom fighter named Dahlia, who shares an enigmatic connection with Moya.

Throughout history, Colin has fallen in battle only to be reborn, his singular focus on exacting revenge against Marcus never waning. As he prepares to face his nemesis once more, Colin must decide whether he will succumb to his hatred or rise above it to lead the people to freedom. In this climactic showdown, only one can emerge victorious.
